sqlMap.select: select set1.*,set2.first_name as candidateName,set2.father_first_name as fatherName,set2.category_code as category,set2.gender as gender from ( select sfm1.rollno as app_number,sfm1.registration_number,sfm1.marks as cca , sfm2.marks as interview , DATE_FORMAT(sfm1.insert_time,'%d/%m/%Y') as insert_Date from student_final_marks sfm1 join student_final_marks sfm2 on sfm1.registration_number =sfm2.registration_number where sfm1.evaluation_component='CA' and sfm2.evaluation_component='PW' and sfm1.creator_id =#creator#)set1 join (select * from entity_student )set2 on set1.app_number=set2.application_number;

select set1.*,set2.first_name as candidateName,set2.father_first_name as fatherName,set2.category_code as category,set2.gender as gender from ( select sfm1.rollno as app_number,sfm1.registration_number,sfm1.marks , DATE_FORMAT(sfm1.insert_time,'%d/%m/%Y') as insert_Date from student_final_marks sfm1 where sfm1.evaluation_component=#evaluation_component# and sfm1.creator_id =#creator#)set1 join (select * from entity_student )set2 on set1.app_number=set2.application_number;

select set1.*,set2.interview,set2.cca from (select application_number,first_name as candidateName ,father_first_name as fatherName , gender,category_code as category from entity_student where application_number =#application_number#)set1 join (select sfm1.sub_status as sub_status_int,sfm2.sub_status as sub_status_cca,sfm1.rollno as app_number, sfm1.registration_number,sfm1.evaluation_component,sfm1.program_id, sfm1.marks as interview,sfm2.marks as cca,sfm1.attended from student_final_marks sfm1 join student_final_marks sfm2 on sfm1.registration_number =sfm2.registration_number and sfm1.program_id=sfm2.program_id where sfm1.rollno=#application_number# and sfm1.evaluation_component ='PW' and sfm2.evaluation_component='CA' group by sfm1.rollno )set2 on set1.application_number=set2.app_number

select if(sfm1.sub_status is null,'',sfm1.sub_status) as sub_status_int,if(sfm2.sub_status is null,'',sfm2.sub_status) as sub_status_cca,sfm1.rollno as app_number,sfm1.registration_number,sfm1.evaluation_component,sfm1.program_id, sfm1.marks as interview,sfm2.marks as cca,sfm1.attended from student_final_marks sfm1 join student_final_marks sfm2 on sfm1.registration_number =sfm2.registration_number and sfm1.program_id=sfm2.program_id where sfm1.rollno=#application_number# and sfm1.evaluation_component ='PW' and sfm2.evaluation_component='CA' group by sfm1.rollno ;
select application_number,first_name as candidateName ,father_first_name as fatherName ,gender,category_code as category from entity_student where application_number =#application_number#;
select user_id as creator,panel_authority as authority from edit_panel_authority where user_id=#creator#;
select application_number ,interview,cca from marks_entry_panel where Present_status ='P' and update_flag ='N' ;

select count(*) as count,set3.program_id,set3.entity_id,set3.registration_number , set3.app_number from (select set1.entity_id,set2.evaluation_component,set1.app_number, set1.registration_number,set1.program_id,set1.program_name from (select sas.application_number as app_number, stn.registration_number,stn.program_id,stn.entity_id,pm.program_name from student_application_status sas join student_test_number stn on sas.application_number=stn.test_number join program_master pm on pm.program_id =stn.program_id where sas.binded_application_number in (select binded_application_number from student_application_status where application_number in(#application_number#)) and stn.called='Y')set1 left join (select registration_number,evaluation_component from student_final_marks where evaluation_component in ('PW','CA') )set2 on set1.registration_number=set2.registration_number) set3 group by set3.program_id order by count(*) desc

select set3.reg_no as registration_number,set3.program_id,set3.entity_id,count(*)as count from(select set1.registration_number as reg_no,set1.program_id,set1.entity_id , set2.registration_number from (select registration_number,program_id,entity_id from student_test_number stn where stn.test_number =#application_number# and stn.called='Y')set1 left join (select registration_number from student_final_marks sfm where evaluation_component in ('PW','CA'))set2 on set1.registration_number =set2.registration_number )set3 group by set3.reg_no
select test_number as application_number,registration_number,program_id, entity_id from student_test_number where test_number =#application_number# and called ='Y'
select evaluation_component from student_final_marks where program_id =#program_id# and registration_number =#registration_number# and evaluation_component in ('CA','PW')
sqlMap.insert: insert into student_final_marks select #program_id#, #entity_id#,#registration_number#, 'PW', marks, branch_code, 'A', start_date, end_date, now(), now(), 'atul', modifier_id, specialization_code, testid, #application_number#, null from student_final_marks limit 1

insert into student_final_marks select #program_id#, #entity_id#,#registration_number#, 'CA', marks, branch_code, 'A', start_date, end_date, now(), now(), 'atul', modifier_id, specialization_code, testid, #application_number#, null from student_final_marks limit 1
sqlMap.update: update student_final_marks set marks =#cca#,attended='P' where registration_number =#registration_number# and evaluation_component='CA' and attended='A';
update student_final_marks set marks =#cca#,attended='P' where registration_number =#registration_number# and evaluation_component='CA' ;
update student_final_marks set marks =#interview#,attended='P' where registration_number =#registration_number# and evaluation_component='PW' and attended='A';
update student_final_marks set marks =#interview#,attended='P' where registration_number =#registration_number# and evaluation_component='PW' ;
sqlMap.select: select marks as cca from student_final_marks where registration_number =#registration_number# and evaluation_component='CA' and attended='P';
select marks as cca from student_final_marks where registration_number =#registration_number# and evaluation_component='CA';
select marks as cca from student_final_marks where registration_number =#registration_number# and evaluation_component='PW';
select marks as interview from student_final_marks where registration_number =#registration_number# and evaluation_component='PW' and attended='P';
select * from ( select application_number,count(*) as cc,class as program_id from marks_entry_panel group by application_number order by application_number )set1 where set1.cc>1 ;
select max(interview) as interview,max(cca) as cca ,application_number,class as program_id from marks_entry_panel where application_number =#application_number#;

select a1.marks as CA , a2.marks as PW , a1.attended from student_final_marks a1 join student_final_marks a2 on a1.rollno =a2.rollno and a1.program_id=a2.program_id where a1.evaluation_component in ('CA') and a2. evaluation_component in ('PW') and a1.rollno=#application_number# ;
sqlMap.update: update marks_entry_panel set interview =#interview#, cca=#cca#,update_flag='N',Present_status='P',interview_marks_flag='duplication', modification_time=now() where application_number =#application_number# and class=#program_id#;
update marks_entry_panel set update_flag ='U',count_update=#count_update# where application_number =#application_number#;
sqlMap.select: select * from cca_int_marks_upload where program_id=#program_id# and application_number =#application_number#;
sqlMap.insert: insert into cca_int_marks_upload (program_id, application_number, cca, interview, present_status, insert_time) values (#program_id#,#application_number#,#cca#,#interview#,#flag#,now());
sqlMap.select: select * from marks_entry_panel where application_number =#application_number#;

select pm.program_name,sfm.rollno as application_number,sfm.registration_number from student_final_marks sfm join program_master pm on pm.program_id =sfm.program_id where registration_number =#registration_number# and evaluation_component in (#category#) and marks='0' and attended='P';

select pm.program_name as ProgramName,es.application_number,stn.registration_number from student_test_number stn join entity_student es on es.application_number =stn.test_number join program_master pm on pm.program_id =stn.program_id where stn.registration_number =#registration_number# and stn.called ='Y';
sqlMap.update: update marks_entry_panel set CCA_OLD=CCA,INT_OLD=interview where application_number =#application_number# and class=#program_id#;
update marks_entry_panel set CCA=#cca#,interview=#interview#,modification_time=now(),update_flag='N' where application_number =#application_number# and class=#program_id#;
sqlMap.select: select * from ( select pm.program_name,mep.application_number,es.first_name ,interview, cca from marks_entry_panel mep join entity_student es on es.application_number =mep.application_number join program_master pm on pm.program_id =mep.class where mep.present_status ='P' and mep.cca = '-1' or mep.interview = '-1' group by mep.application_number)set1 ;
